artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Jōshūya Jūzō / Jūbei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: right: 七太夫娘お米 (Iwai Kumesaburō III as Shichidayū\'s daughter Oyone) | center: 千崎弥五郎 (Ichikawa Kuzō II as Senzaki Yagorō) | left: 百性弥作 (Nakamura Utaemon IV as the peasant Yasaku)
markings: each sheet, red artist\'s toshidama seal | censor seals: 村松 {Muramatsu}, 吉村 {Yoshimura}; publisher\'s seal: 重 {Jū}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}; C: 梓元乃應需豊國画 {hanmoto no ōju Toyokuni ga}; L: 應需豊國画 {ōju Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Chūkō homare no Takanawa 忠孝誉高輪, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1848, 3rd month.
title: Actors Iwai Kumesaburō III as Shichidayū's daughter Oyone (R), Ichikawa Kuzō II as Senzaki Yagorō (C), Nakamura Utaemon IV as the peasant Yasaku (L) in the play Chūkō homare no Takanawa, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 3rd month 1848
